section.title: Events
section.para: There is a single event fired by &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor, which represents a response to a request, received in a specific HttpClientNIORequestActivity instance.

row.entry: A response event to an asynchronous HTTP request.

important.para: Spaces where introduced in Name, Vendor and Event Class column values, to correctly render the table. Please remove them when using copy/paste.

section.para: The response event class provides the result of sending an HTTP request, which can be response or exception, due to error.
